Title: Otona nya Koi no Shikata ga Wakaranee!
Description: ['Mio Sudou, a 30-year-old office lady has gone five years without a boyfriend and has forgotten all about love. Shuuji Mashima, a foreign-affiliated consultant has not had a girlfriend in seven years and has lost almost all interest in women. Meeting at a matchmaking party, Mio is disgusted by Shuuji as he states, "I am not into women." However, when Mio makes a provocative comment toward Shuuji, things take an unexpected direction.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: MAL News)', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', The uncensored episodes were distributed online via Comic Festa Anime Zone. The censored version was broadcast on Tokyo MX. This database entry reflects censored TV version of the anime.]
Related: ['Adaptation: Otona nya Koi no Shikata ga Wakaranee!']
